alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Dukes; Eastern Plymouth; Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Statement issued September 29 at 2:12PM EDT until September 30 at 3:00AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD STATEMENT IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING THROUGH LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...less than a foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.0 to 12.8 feet Mean Lower Low Water). * WHERE...Eastern Plymouth MA, Barnstable MA, Dukes MA and Nantucket MA Counties. * WHEN...From 10 PM EDT this evening through late tonight. * IMPACTS...Some water on low lying roads and property. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...places that typically experience minor flooding will likely have a repeat occurrence with the midnight high tide cycle tonight and again with the midday Saturday high tide cycle. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. info.instruction: Do not drive through flooded roadways.
